FuncDef:
The accounting dual-stack command configures the accounting mode for IPv4/IPv6 dual-stack users.
By default, accounting is performed separately for IPv4 users and IPv6 users.

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates that traffic of IPv4 and IPv6 users is sent to the server separately and then accounted separately.
-

Indicates that traffic of IPv4 and IPv6 users is sent to the server together and then accounted together.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When separate is configured, traffic of IPv4 and IPv6 users is sent separately. The separate parameter applies to the scenarios where the tariffs of IPv4 and IPv6 traffic are different. When identical is configured, traffic of IPv4 and IPv6 users is sent together for unified processing.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
